attributes.action: Stop the application to build a Mosque on Thorley Lane, Timperley  Green Belt
attributes.background: The proposed building of a Mosque on Thorley Lane is totally unacceptable -   it is Green Belt + volume of traffic along Thorley Lane, Wood Lane etc is frightening any increase will only add to the dangers not only for school children -  two schools in very close proximity.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning decisions are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
